intro.title: Least Mora. Best Artifact.
intro.body: Artifact Sim has a unique artifact score prediction feature that can predict the artifact score at level 20 based on the it's status at level 0.

usage.title: How to use
usage.body: You can use it on your phone with just a tap. Please see the tutorial first.

toEditor.title: Go to Editor
toEditor.body: If you are not sure how to use it, you can open the guide from the menu.

socialMedia.title: Social Media
socialMedia.body: Development diaries and other works can be found on Youtube and our blog.
